wms_article.title: Samsung Electro-Mechanics Q2 earnings rise on AI, auto parts sales

wms_article_body.body: Samsung Electro-Mechanics Co. reported continued growth in the second quarter of 2025, driven by robust sales of artificial intelligence (AI) server and automotive electronics components. The company said Thursday that it posted consolidated revenue of 2.78 trillion won (about $2 billion) and operating profit of 213 billion won for the April to June period. Revenue rose eight percent from a year earlier, while operating profit edged up one percent. On a quarter-over-quarter basis, revenue increased two percent and operating profit climbed six percent. “Demand for AI server and electric vehicle components continues to grow,” the company said, noting that its focus on high value-added products has supported profitability improvements.
